automation_productivity.reasoning: Generates designs and prototypes from prompts, reducing manual drafting.

data_experimental_flexibility.reasoning: Limited controls over model parameters or dataset customization.

visual_no_code_development.reasoning: Enables drag-and-drop design and prototyping without coding.

workflow_agent_orchestration.reasoning: Integrates with Figma projects but lacks broader automation orchestration.
